### Tender Announcement: Engineering Support for Remotely Operated and Autonomous Systems (ROAS) 

#### Summary

The Government of Canada, represented by Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC), is seeking proposals from qualified service providers for the acquisition of engineering services to support perception and control for remotely operated and autonomous systems (ROAS). This requirement is in support of Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) located in Valcartier, Quebec, Canada.

#### Key Details

* **Reference Number**: W7701-237642
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 2, 2023, at 14:00 HAE (Eastern Daylight Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: June 1, 2023
* **Service Category**: Product research and development
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Quebec
* **Contracting Entity**: PWGSC, on behalf of DRDC
* **Contact**: Marie-Claude Lussier, SPAC/PSPC
  + Email: [marie-claude.lussier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:marie-claude.lussier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
  + Phone: Not available

#### Proposal Requirements

Bidders must submit their proposals in accordance with the requirements outlined in Annex A. Proposals must be submitted on or before the tender closing date, and any late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

#### Procurement Details

This tender is issued under a competitive process, and the selection criteria is based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price. The contract will be awarded to the bidder who meets the requirements and provides the best value to the Government of Canada.

#### Notice URL

The notice can be found at: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15679522?extsite=MTU2Nzk1MjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15679522?extsite=MTU2Nzk1MjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
